tool_description: Provide real-time news and articles sourced from Google News.

api_list.name: Supported languages and regions
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve a list of supported languages and regions.

api_list.name: Suggest
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to get autocomplete suggestions or query predictions as a user types a search query.

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: The mandatory parameter to specify the search term

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to search for news from Google News based on keywords.

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: The mandatory parameter to specify the search term
